name: Recyclinator Alpha
description:
The quality of this alpha version DOES NOT represent the quality of the full game.

Full game available for free now:

Recyclinator Alpha is a physics puzzle/management/throwing stuff around game where you have to deliver cans and bottles from one side of the room to another.

You begin by loading the objects manually, but you will quickly find easier ways to do it. Try to get as rich as possible, or just make a really cool contraption.

This version of the game is made for Ludum Dare 37 and was made in just over 24 hours. If anyone likes this game i will make a revamped version of it.

Please read the included README file.

Ludum Dare: Link
